website_summaries.verdict: Not the best choice if you need utensils that are safe to use on nonstick surfaces; otherwise this 11-piece set is practical and beautiful.
pros: With the exception of the silicone-topped turner, this set boasts an all-stainless steel design that looks great in contemporary kitchens
Includes some of the most popular kitchen tools
cons: A few of the pieces feel like they could bend easily
Will scratch some cookware surfaces, such as some nonstick coatings

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son's first hosting fancy dinner
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this utensils set for his fancy dinner he hosted. He said the serving spoons worked great to dish out the food at the table and the spatula and tongs were great for cooking with. He was complimented on how nice they were. He's happy I bought this set for him. I'm impressed with how shiny they are after their cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of all my plastic, synthetic, whatever utensils were melting when I cooked so I chose this set for durability. They are absolutely beautiful! Just the right weight and won't melt. Thank you Maphyton for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews... I was expecting these to be nicer. They are OK, just not as high end looking as I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: TooMuchStuff

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and poorly finished
customer_reviews.text: Material too flimsy and poorly finished (see rough edge on spatula heel in photo attached)
customer_reviews.author: John Inserra

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, high quality set!
customer_reviews.text: This set of utensils is really good quality! I have bought other sets that were somewhat flimsy and these are very sturdy and strong. No bending when picking up food with them. They look really nice and include pretty much all the utensils you should need. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not solid metal
customer_reviews.text: The back side of these are not solid. They will easily bend if mixing something thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for price, might be a little bendy
customer_reviews.text: These seem decent for the price. Some of the utensils seem a bit bendy where the neck and business end join, the noodle scooper seems the worst. That said, they're performing well so far and seem to be decent. I'm worried that in time they may get bent but I don't think they're going to fall apart necessarily. Overall satisfied but that one aspect could be improved a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Satyr

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not the quality I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Not as high quality as I was looking for. Don’t get me wrong, they aren’t terrible, but I was disappointed that the handles were stamped metal not solid or forged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: there is no weight to these...the handles are hollow and very rough on your hands. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne F

customer_reviews.title: Rubber spatula broke after ~ 3 months of sporadic use
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used this piece that much, but over the weekend decided to make some fresh salted caramel and during the process the spatula broke in two. All other pieces in the set have held up well so not sure if this was just a QC issue or poor material (other pieces are all stainless steel). Only issue, otherwise a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!! You wont regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for my cast iron and stainless steel pots and pans. They look great hanging in my kitchen! They are very sturdy and work perfectly for both CI and SS. Definitely not to use woth non-stick, would also work well for grilling, although I have not...yet.
customer_reviews.author: julie s

customer_reviews.title: Small Sized
customer_reviews.text: These are too small and need to be about 30% larger in size to be useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and value
customer_reviews.text: very versatile set for cooking and I would say it's of nice quality for this price. Slightly not easy to clean, esp. the egg stirrer, but generally ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and the durability
customer_reviews.text: I Love this set of Utensil because it’s durability and it very to clean and it look fantastic on my kitchen counter. I am so glad I made this purchased. Thx👍
customer_reviews.author: Selfimpact

customer_reviews.title: You can Spoon, but not Fork!
customer_reviews.text: They do all promised! There are no Large Forks included.
customer_reviews.author: Shywanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not solid, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but the quality feels cheap and it’s not aolid
customer_reviews.author: Albrecht Gifts

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and classy
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced all of my old rubber burnt utensils and now my kitchen feels so upgraded. So much variety in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for rent house.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for rent house. Quality and dishwasher safe. The get the job done and not flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: A really good assortment of utensils - everything you need. They are strong, sturdy, solid and the metal cleans really easily - will have these a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dewitte Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Utensils
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I got sick of my plastic utensils falling apart. These are nice, heavy weight stainless and 1 of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Roos

customer_reviews.title: It is good to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought it and used it for a while. The material is very good, but it would be better if we had a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Roc Zhu

customer_reviews.title: like it but not a solid feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but it seem not strong and can ban easliy. I still like them but wish they were stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: I love the love the look and match with my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: anthony delgado

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces received.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are great except I received to bottle openers and no vegetable peeler. My only option is to return the entire package instead of them just sending the missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that Asian cooking recipes, makes the work very easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred Padron

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and gets it done. No rust thus far
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I ordered this product. I have several All Clad utensils and honesty you can’t tell the difference in weight or performance. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality products
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really good value. For the price and quality. When my friend saw it and she asks me where I got from and she wants get them too since the quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: jiajia lu

customer_reviews.title: The (BEST UTENSILS)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for STURDY & HEAVEY DUTY Utensils, I found them, These are just like the ones my Mom use to have back in 1972. Thank you Maphyton for making the best cooking UTENSILS
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: This company was easy to work with!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple months ago, finally went to use the CanOpener and it broke On the first turn. **Updated** The company sent me a brand new canopener and it works amazing! Love this set!!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Dimick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pieces. They look great hanging just above my slide in stove. With prime shipping got here super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Arrived in a timely manner. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Spera

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Just open this! Very good quality! Good price!! One set can meet all needs in my kitchen. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Soeng

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My mom love this so much. These are looking clean and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints and they all work great, they came as expected and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY STAINLESS STEEL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set last Dec 2019, no stains at all so far. I love my absolutely stainless steel sets.
customer_reviews.author: Myung Joo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitchen Gadgets
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package as soon as I received it. I was surprised with these high quality kitchen gadget set, they look expensive, shiny and great. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christaneka Marie

customer_reviews.title: 100* pleased
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful utensils!! I expect them to last my lifetime. 100 per cent pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kitchen Utensils
customer_reviews.text: I do wish that it had come with the bar to hang them. That would have been great. Other than that - they are just what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Nebaska Gma

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: They are look good. Very useful for my new kitchen. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: JINGJING SHI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed an upgrade to my cookware. I had other stainless utensils but these are amazing. I’m not a big person on reviews however these deserve a review. They have a good weight to them, they are sturdy and I cook a lot with cast iron pans and it didn’t transfer heat when I left them in the pan. Not saying to do that regularly. I was impressed with these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Barbiero

customer_reviews.title: Nice utensils
customer_reviews.text: I really like these utensils. They are sturdy and easy to clean. I would be cautious if you put them in the dishwasher. They get water spots easy but rinse and wipe dry and they are all good. Overall nice product would buy again for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest

customer_reviews.title: Very good set of utensils!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set of cooking utensils! It virtually has all the different spoons, spatulas, tongs, whisk, etc. that anyone would need to cook! I love the fact that it's all stainless steel and should last a LONG time! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tj69

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Good-Quality for the price comparable too more expensive sets
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift & it is Very Cherished! Lots of Positive complements; good thickness/dishwasher safe/holding it's shine/edges are smooth. Stores in the drawers Fine...So Many items Makes a WOW Presentation upon Opening too!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda123

customer_reviews.title: Best Utensil Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best strong set of utensils ever!!!! They are so easy to clean! I love this set. The sellers are easy to get ahold of and will help you with any question you have!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of utensils. I decided to replace virtually all of my silicone utensils because I got so tired of the nasty, slimy film they always had. I look forward to these new utensils lasting for many years to come...and no slime!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel at a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The stainless steel washes okay. Ships in a sturdy box with each utensil in plastic. Utensils are strong for everyday cooking as well as outdoor cooking. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with utensils.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my utensils. I give them a 5 star rating. Will recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: gordie collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive sturdy nice to handle cooking utensils. I absolutely love them. Price point is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful utensil set
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are beautiful and great to work with. They look nice and are functional. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Linda

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of stuff in this kit
customer_reviews.text: Had to open up a new drawer space just to get it all in.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These would be a great starter set for a kid going to college. Not sturdy or nice enough if you are looking for a long term set that will last. Very thin and cheap looking. I returned them to spring for a more expensive set that will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: matthew w goldey

product_meta.title: Maphyton Stainless Steel Utensils 11 Pieces Kitchen Utensil Set for Cooking with Spatula
feature_bullets: ✔ BEST COOKWARE TOOL - This 11pcs stainless steel utensil set will covers your all kinds of cooking needs, including spatula, whisk, spaghetti server, asla turner, non-slotted turner, slotted turner, skimmer, slotted spoon, ladle, basting spoon and tongs.

✔ UNRIVALED QUALITY - Each piece is well constructed from sturdy, durable high grade stainless steel for great performance. Looks, feels and performs better than Nylon, and other Non-Stick materials which melt overtime.

✔FAITHFUL KITCHEN PARTNER - Each Maphyton cooking utensils is crafted with 100% eco friendly materials, high grade stainless steel & silicone are absolutely safe and will faithfully serve you for years.

✔USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - Wash your stainless steel cooking utensils easily with soapy water or place it conveniently in the dishwasher to save time and effort. Hang it from the special hanger holes, to declutter your drawers and highlight your kitchen décor!
✔BEAUTIFULLY CURVED HANDLE - The special arc handle design makes you more comfortable and relaxed when cooking.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
